Prophecy of Reprisal.name: Prophecy of Reprisal
Prophecy of Reprisal.flavor: The power of your deity arcs through your weapon and into your foe, giving it pause. Any grievous wounds you have sustained focus the strength your heritage provides once again.
Prophecy of Reprisal.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Prophecy of Reprisal.effect: If you are bloodied, you regain the use of your furious assault racial power if you have already expended it.

Catastrophic Impact.name: Catastrophic Impact
Catastrophic Impact.flavor: You raise your weapon high, and it crackles with the power of the storm as you charge.
Catastrophic Impact.special: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when you charge.
Catastrophic Impact.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning and thunder damage, and the target is blinded and deafened (save ends).
Catastrophic Impact.onMiss: Half damage and the target is blinded and deafened until the end of your next turn.
Catastrophic Impact.effect: If you are bloodied, you regain the use of your furious assault racial power if you have already expended it.

Charging Rebuke.name: Charging Rebuke
Charging Rebuke.flavor: You drive back those that would attack you as you make your way across the battlefield.
Charging Rebuke.trigger: An enemy hits you with an opportunity attack
Charging Rebuke.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll. After the attack is resolved, you push the target 2 squares.
